author: CBC News
title: Winnipeg family builds Lego version of prime minister's COVID-19 message to kids
description: A Winnipeg family has hit the bricks to share Prime Minister Justin Trudeau's message to children in a video that features little Lego versions of him, reporters and a cameo appearance by Manitoba's top public health officials.
content:
A Winnipeg family has hit the bricks to share Prime Minister Justin Trudeau's message to children in a video that features little Lego versions of him, reporters and a cameo appearance by Manitoba's top public health officials.
